text:
In the docker-compose, add the following line “ES_JAVA_OPTS=-Xmx3g” to the environment section in order to give more memory to the Elasticsearch process:
```
elasticsearch:
image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.5.0
environment:
- discovery.type=single-node
- xpack.security.enabled=false
- ES_JAVA_OPTS=-Xmx3g
ports:
- "9200:9200"
- "9300:9300"
restart: always
networks:
- app-network
```
For GitHub codespace, this work for me: - ES_JAVA_OPTS=-Xms512m -Xmx512m
question: Elasticsearch container keeps restarting
